h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Be sure to check the right corner first to find Tree Pearls to harvest, and a floating green Wisp in the left corner to absorb.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to check the right corner first to find Tree Pearls to harvest, and a floating green Wisp in the left corner to absorb.
